response.original_title: How do I renew my Best Buy Geek Squad protection? {{GET~REFUND}}
response.overview: To renew your Best Buy Geek Squad Protection, call 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 and follow the automated or live agent instructions. You can quickly renew by confirming your plan details and making a payment over the phone at 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638, which is the fastest option. If your plan is expiring, contact 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 before the end date to avoid coverage gaps. For help with renewal eligibility, billing, or plan terms, speak directly to Geek Squad support at 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638. This toll-free line 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 ensures secure and immediate assistance
